events.text: Not really necessary currently, but can later be used to refer to the value since it's always correct
Set TurnOrder for each enemy when enemy turn starts, set TurnDone to false, count enemies

events.title: Enemy_Slime
events.description:
Enemy that moves towards player every other turn
Damages player instead if adjacent

children.title: SlimeTurn
children.description: Things that happen when the Slime's turn starts

actions.text: Is in melee range to Player
damaged and death set in EnemyDamaged function
attack set in SlimeTurn

children.text: Highlight when about to be attacked

actions.text: Set EnemyMoveTile angle towards next pathfinding node

events.title: E_Skeleton
events.description:
Enemy that moves towards player every turn, but only if sees player
Moves to last location it saw player in if loses sight
Damages player instead if adjacent

children.title: SkeletonTurn
children.description: Things that happen when the Skeleton's turn starts

actions.text: Is in melee range to Player
Is not in melee range to Player
Sees Player
Does not see Player, but is still chasing
Set EnemyMoveTile angle towards next pathfinding node
Sees Player
damaged and death set in EnemyDamaged function
attack set in SkeletonTurn

children.text: Highlight when about to be attacked

events.title: E_Ghost
events.description:
Enemy that moves towards player every other turn
Resets action timer upon sighting or losing sight of player
Shoots at player from range if in sight instead
Hits in melee if in melee instead

children.title: GhostTurn
children.description: Things that happen when the Ghost's turn starts

actions.text: Sees Player
Sees player, starts readying attack
Does not see Player
Loses sight of player, starts readying movement
If SeesPlayer state hasn't changed, do actions
Is in melee range to Player
Is not in melee
Sees Player
Does not see Player
damaged and death set in EnemyDamaged function

children.text: Highlight when about to be attacked

actions.text: Set EnemyMoveTile angle towards next pathfinding node

events.text: Set health bars, needs to be separate to select mask via container

children.text: If there's no enemy for the current Turn, increment Turn (Check if there's no enemy with Turn TurnOrder, then if it's enemy turn add 1)
If using TurnOrder != Turn, the statement would always be true so it has to be done in a slightly more Roundabout way (To Be Continued)
